author: Julie Daniel
reviewText: Literally my favorite app of all time. A large variety of challenging & fun puzzles with ZERO ads, microtransactions, or initial costs. Ironically, that makes it one of the few apps I wish I could shovel money at.

author: DK Eller
reviewText: Best game app ever! No ads, no bugs, lots of different games so never gets old. Love this app! Don't change a thing!

author: Nathan Bending
reviewText: Fun, free and spam free! I'd pay for this if it wasn't free. Simple interface but it's not about the GUI experience, just lots of fun and challenging logic type puzzles. All the classics are here.

author: Brent Hoskisson
reviewText: Addictive Some of these puzzles are amazingly addictive. I always want to do another one after I finish one. I would like to see a hint button sometimes.

author: Denilson SÌÁ
reviewText: The best The best puzzle collection on Android. The source-code is available and the same puzzles are also available on Mac/Windows/Linux/HTML/iOS/Palm/Nokia S60.

author: Linda Beugelsdijk
reviewText: Puzzle Maniak Not sure, but is this a follow up to puzzle maniak? Anyway, really like it. But is there a way to make the error markings (mostly in red) optional so you could turn it on/off during a game?

author: Daniel Bliss
reviewText: Genius This is a treasure trove of brilliant puzzle games. A must have for puzzle enthusiasts. THIS IS THE RIGHT VERSION. Do not get the knock offs.

author: Sam Norton
reviewText: Perfect algorithms... First game must have been a fluke or I must have missed something. 10 more games on hard and no stale mates. Good algorithms. Only thing that could be improved is the look.

author: Richard Stephens
reviewText: Fantastic, addictive Brilliant puzzles. Nicely balanced with skill levels to suit beginners to experts. Can't get enough of them.

author: Matthew Gilzinger
reviewText: What a free app should be Ad free, not pay to win, fun, enjoyable, doesnt need any permissions. Not bloated either. If you are looking at this, just get the puzzles already!

author: Brent Edwards
reviewText: A superb collectiin of puzzles. Don't let the simple graphics fool you: These puzzles are excellent and well designed.

author: Christopher Newell
reviewText: No frills, just good. I have my favourites that I keep going back to again and again. There are lots of puzzles for every ability, and no ads anywhere! It really is a bare-bones proposition. The help is a text file, and there are no hints. If you're stuck, you can always jump to the solution. That's not a hint, but it can help you determine techniques. I would be willing to contribute a couple dollars for this app.

author: Tracie Powers
reviewText: Freezes your device Updated review, had a problem with this freezing my device but uninstalled/ re-installed and fingers crossed working perfectly again. Great range of puzzles only problem is its soooo hard to put down

author: Christian Renato
reviewText: L-O-V-E great time waster

author: Maggie Robertson
reviewText: Great puzzles Plenty to choose from and several levels in each. Great for 5 mins break or an hour's puzzling. Best puzzles I've downloaded so far

author: Abdulvahid I_IK
reviewText: Awesome! Perfect! Even minesweeper is better then Windows' one!

author: charly Koch
reviewText: my fav game collection I stumbled upon this a few years ago when it came with Linux OS for PC. I've been hooked since then and happy to have found it for Android as well. Highly recommended! <3

author: Alexis Brenner
reviewText: Awesome, simple, love it. Great selection of games without the flash. Best puzzle app I have.

author: GURU BHARATHI
reviewText: Excellent This is crazy! So many games. All in one app? Wow! This is amazing. Superb work. All games designed well!

author: Johnny Wei
reviewText: Amazing The graphics aren't great but there's a massive variety of games. Great for killing time.

author: Peter Shaw
reviewText: Great collection This is the way it should be. No intrusive advertising, gratifying gameplay and varying difficulties of each puzzle. Loopy is my personal favourite!

author: A Google User
reviewText: Could be added that game to spot the square of different shade (kuku kube)?

author: Prasanna Gadkari
reviewText: 10+stars _ÙÎÎ This is the best collection of puzzles with no ads and great AI _Ù÷_‰÷¼. Thank you Simon. You rock _ÙªÎ

reviewText: Just perfect.

author: juna jabian
reviewText: I just love it. So compact. In just an app.

author: abbey davies
reviewText: Crap Awfuk

author: Thomas Schellhous
reviewText: Simple with tons of variety

author: Chris Milton
reviewText: OMG I think I'm in heaven ;)

author: Azhar Juman
reviewText: A Classic. Assembling all the puzzles in one app, with highly customisable settings, and it even comes with its own instruction manual, offline & no ads.

author: Christine Fraser
reviewText: Addictive! I have this on my tablet and am adding it to my phone. A nice range of challenging puzzles to engage your brain and no ridiculous, flashing nonsense or insufferable adverts. If this had initially been on a free trial basis I'd pay to keep it.

author: Matthew Chatwin
reviewText: Puzzles are great, no ads, what's not to like?

author: Shiva Argula
reviewText: What more can someone ask for? Free, no ads, smooth game without unnecessary animations. The puzzles are pretty fun too.

author: Mark Wheeler
reviewText: Lotsa fun! Great collection of games.

author: Ds SCbs
reviewText: Excellent No extra permissions required, great one

author: Todd Moore
reviewText: Good variety Fun collection of distractions

author: Josh Jackson
reviewText: Great compilation A great collection of many great puzzles. Lots of customization, lots of replayability

author: Geoff Mastbrook
reviewText: EXACTLY what we ask for! A bunch of games for free with absolutely no ads!? Yes please! !

author: Maria FLORIDA
reviewText: Best app ever! Simple but complete. Thank you!

author: Austin Frey
reviewText: Great App The equivalent of owning ten other game apps, in a single compact space

author: Sorin Lascu
reviewText: Perfect in every way Fun puzzle games that you can have on anything. No tracking, no only online. Just you and your puzzles. Best minesweeper implementation I seen bar none.

author: xyzemboh1
reviewText: Awesome! I'd give 6 stars if I could

author: Tim Harris
reviewText: Wow! A great variety of puzzle games What a pleasure. Ads-free puzzles from easy to very difficult. The controls work well, even on my small mobile phone screen, despite the growing size as I progress to the larger challenges. Thanks for collecting and presenting them.

author: Jake Wimberley
reviewText: Incredible How can this possibly be free?! Every game is engaging. Great interface, well documented, no ads!

author: Noah Keates
reviewText: Best game on the app store Truely no ads or IAPs, which is amazing. Every puzzle is fun and challenging, and the customization is fantastic, allowing you to tailor the game to your preference. ZERO complaints, would highly recommend.

author: Mark Chamberlain
reviewText: Great And somehow free

author: Sebastian Rice
reviewText: Favorite app I have If this wasn't free I'd buy it. It's bare bones but if you like logic games and aren't invested in GUIs, you should download this.

author: Erik Bruun
reviewText: Perfect logic puzzle collection Includes a ton of my favorites, including akari, dominos, slitherlink and many others

author: Jonathan Dingess
reviewText: Truly deserving of 5 stars

author: JC Puckett
reviewText: Simple yet addictive Games are easy to learn but can be difficult to master at the highest difficulty levels. So many different logic games. I play this all the time. This is the third phone I've installed it on.

author: Ted Sunnerton
reviewText: Excellent collection Good puzzles, ad free, with a simple and consistent interface. Easy to learn, endlessly diverting. Perfect score. Well done!

author: Martijn van Schaardenburg
reviewText: So much goodness in such a concise package. The controls are a bit rusty for some puzzles, but nothing major.

author: Andrea Arturo Giuseppe Grossi
reviewText: Smart. Fun. A lot! Why all the games can't be like these? Excellent work! Really good!

author: Aldi Febriansyah
reviewText: So cool My only friend when im bored. Simple interface, easy to play. Great app.

author: Kim Brouer
reviewText: The best version of these puzzles on any platform.

author: Tilak S. Naik
reviewText: Great work Always wanted an app like this. Best time-killer

author: Mark Diehr
reviewText: Puzzles galore Free, offline, wonderful.

author: karyn ward
reviewText: Brilliant app, something for everyone and no adverts. Thanks!

author: Hector Padilla
reviewText: Hours and hours Probably the best free compilation of puzzle games. And it's open source!

author: Iain Ballard
reviewText: An excellent collection of games

author: James Butler
reviewText: Lots of choice Great collection of single player games with various difficulty levels

author: brixk
reviewText: Nothing can better than this

author: Mohammad Iqbal Assegaf
reviewText: Free It is free. Nuff said

author: Jason Boxx
reviewText: had to re rate 5 stars perfect free game entertaining and long life games, really worth a download and developers you need to consider charging nothing to expensive but 10p a download would still be a bargain

author: Anthony Neal
reviewText: The best set of free puzzles with no ads or iap

author: Jarret Delle Donne
reviewText: Phenomenal lightweight app Fast, responsive app for offline play or even with low battery. 40 games, infinite play time. Difficulty customisation is great. Highly recommended.

author: Terry Tater
reviewText: Cool Nice honest product

author: Joshua Rothenberg
reviewText: A fabulous, simple app The perfect games app. Good, complex, fair games. No ads. Free. Nothing you could want more from.

author: Roy Wonder Cohen
reviewText: Great games for the maind

author: Ken Freeland
reviewText: What a gift! Had never seen the Towers game before, and it was love at first sight, and that's only one of these challenging puzzles. All this and no ads! Can only hope it stays that way. Kudos to its creator(s)!

author: Sterling Felsted
reviewText: Best. Game. Ever. No exaggeration. No ads, easy on the battery, everything is customisable and easy to navigate. Game appears slightly crude, but rest assured what IS there is magnificent. 39 customisable games, from easy and master-able to tricky enough to where there's several games modes I'm scared to try in hard mode. Best game I have ever seen! This is what game makers should strive for!!

author: Drew Holtzapfel
reviewText: Update Still awesome. Keen is my favorite. Highly addicting

author: Gustavo Jeuken
reviewText: The only game you need I have played this game for years! If I had to pay a cent for every hour of this enjoyment this app has given me, it would cost me a lot of money, but thankfully it is free! :)

author: myra crilley
reviewText: Love it! I really like it, the puzzles are fun, and best of all, IT'S FREE. But I'm dumb and some of the puzzles I can't get the hang of, even if I read the instructions 50 times. But anyway, It's great fun, and definitely a wonderful app. Keep it up! _Ù÷_

author: Keahn Hedayat
reviewText: Unadulterated Collection of puzzles with good documentation, uncorrupted by monetization.

author: A Google User
reviewText: The best puzzle collection ever.

author: Vasanth Kumar
reviewText: Love it I get it installed in any Linux or Android system that I have.

author: Scott Mackinlay
reviewText: If you like thinking, this is the app for you Hours of fun

author: Mg Nyunt
reviewText: Incredible App All in one logic game Worth 5 stars

author: Lukas Ponicke
reviewText: Wow I absolutely love it! Especially the special version of minesweeper! Less frustrating but more challenging

author: Becky Pennella
reviewText: Great Variety My boyfriend is always stealing my tablet to play this game.

author: ALISON MAYRIDOY
reviewText: All time favourite First day I got a tablet, downloaded this. Five years later, its the only thing I still have. Many games come and go - this is like an old friend. No money, no WiFi, no adds, no time issues just fun. Can set games from easy time filler right up to near impossible as you like

author: Josh Brown
reviewText: Wow A huge variety, well programmed, lots of fun. Amazing app

author: Jonathan Brooke
reviewText: Still playing I got this app almost a year ago and I still play it often. I like the new puzzle, Palisade, but I think the line color contrast needs adjusted. The green lines should be more distinguishable from the gray lines in day mode, since groups of connected squares are more important than they were in Loopy. Right now it's hard to tell how many squares I already have in each group.

author: Diego Floor
reviewText: Great collection These are not original puzzles and do not have a well polished presentation. But any puzzle fan will love this package! I've seen many of these puzzles being sold in Google store before without a single mention on its source of inspiration.

author: Zack Nathan
reviewText: Thank You Amazing of you to make this free. Wow. No complaints

author: Stacey Weber
reviewText: Love the puzzles Unlike most apps, this has a large variety of puzzles rather than just one. The difficulty can be changed to suit every ability level. A new puzzle was just added, and I'm addicted to it already! If I could, I'd give this app 10 Stars.

author: Skylar Wolf
reviewText: A fun set of puzzles to play. This is a fun set of puzzles to play with, it includes many great puzzles for free, all in one app, no ads, no micro transactions, no crap. Each puzzle also includes a nice help section.

author: Mark Scruggs
reviewText: Perfect I honestly love it, the variety is awesome, and it being ACTUALLY free makes me feel happy that the creators of this app just like fun puzzle games and think that that should be all there is to it. I wish more companies worked like this one does. Great job

author: A Google User
reviewText: Excellent mix very nice combination of games. No ads or annoyances. Makes installing of many other games unnecessary. For years now!

author: Alex Agnew
reviewText: Incredible Value Lots of games, bound to be something for everyone. I'm loving Undead atm. Algorithm generated puzzles ensure you never run out. All for free. Incredible. Thank you.

author: Jwana Montague
reviewText: Great One of a very few apps I can recommend without any reservations. Exactly the type of app I'll keep over many different phones. Simple and does exactly what I want.

author: A Google User
reviewText: Awesome Interface improvements a few versions ago are subtle but sweet. Great set of puzzles - something for everyone...

author: Srikanth Guduru
reviewText: Awesome Simon is true geek of programming. Visit his webpage. You will be motivated for writing small and powerful applications and mainly thinking different logic which are out of the box.

author: Jane Gleed
reviewText: Must have Love these brain teasers

author: Peter Stillson
reviewText: Kudos I have this for one game NET. Very challenging! Play on highest setting but have to long press as I go along (you'll see what I mean but advise starting on the easiest and working up). GG to dev on this.

author: Alex Snively
reviewText: Great There is no reason for less than five stars. The app is free and doesnt have any ads. The instructions for the games could be a little better but I like to figure things out on my own anyway. I have yet to find any bugs in any of the games.

author: Maurice Beelen
reviewText: Be advised: very addictive :-)

author: Grace Liang
reviewText: Everything I was looking for, and light app Excellent variety of logic games, simple gameplay, had no ads (despite being a free app) and was also light on battery. Requires no wifi connection, as it's a collection of small one-player puzzles, and easy to play on the go.

author: James Mathias
reviewText: Huge collection of puzzles Tons of options for all levels of play.

author: Alexander Groberman
reviewText: If you want a sharper brain, download this now!

author: Euan Smith
reviewText: The best I have installed in one form or another on every device I have. Excellent puzzles, well implemented and huge variety make it a permanent feature.

author: Alexis Richard
reviewText: How is that even free Holy heck

author: brandon gatto
reviewText: Literally the best app My favorite app, keeps me sane, worth thousands of dollars of Sudoku puzzle books.

author: Anthony H.
reviewText: Great, but not entirely. Has several games that are a lot of fun to play. Unfortunately, the other 80% of the games available are either too confusing or just frustratingly annoying to play. But still, there are plenty there to keep me happy and entertained when I'm in the mood. Good job!

author: Dan Habot
reviewText: Absolutely hours of the best logic games out there in the kindest simplest theme ever. Thank you

author: Jon Wentz
reviewText: Terrific fun Each game takes only a little time to understand but longer to get good at. Very challenging puzzles, and lots of variety. Great for brain exercise! This is one of my favorite apps.

author: Michael Lautermilch
reviewText: Best of its kind! A very thorough collection of all of the best logic puzzles, plus several that I had never seen before.

author: Andrew Michaelis
reviewText: Best puzzles! I love all of the games in this collection. Being able to dynamically generate any puzzle with custom sizes or types is a huge bonus too!

author: Andrea Smith
reviewText: Absolute best collection of puzzles While the graphics aren't as flashy as some others, there are so many different kinds of puzzles at various levels of difficulty and they are self-generating so you never run out!

author: Samuel Hunter
reviewText: Low App Size Love it - that, combined with no ads is wonderful. Couldn't fall back

author: Nidhi Arora
reviewText: Awesome Havent seen a better logic puzzle collection

author: Kalpataru A.I
reviewText: LUV IT SO MUCH!!! BEST TIME KILLERS!!!!

author: Robert Warborn
reviewText: Great stuff!

author: Mike Williamson
reviewText: Best collection! This one app has a better collection of great puzzles than EVERYTHING else I've seen on the play store, combined!

author: Raymond Bong
reviewText: Well built puzzle app No beautiful deco or background, but hit the very right spot being a puzzle game. Control is pretty well designed, and with customize levels for all games. Superb!

author: John Richardson
reviewText: Brilliant game if you love puzzles! This has no ads, loads of favourites and other puzzles. Better than the rest.

author: David Dolphin
reviewText: Classics Controls work well

author: James Irwin
reviewText: Awesom app

author: Paul Whelan
reviewText: Fantastic Not a pretty app but I really don't care, a great selection of puzzles and a great way to pass some time.

author: Adamant King
reviewText: Great collection, thank you

author: Carl Friedrich Gauss
reviewText: Best of its kind Love it

author: Kristine Gallant
reviewText: Wish I could give it more stars. The best collection of games/puzzles out there.

author: Nathan Bending
reviewText: Fun, free and spam free! I'd pay for this if it wasn't free. Simple uncluttered interface and lots of fun and challenging logic type puzzles. All the classics are here.

author: Randar Zalthor
reviewText: Excellent. I play only one game on this really but because it always generates a new grid every time I'll always be playing it.

author: A Google User
reviewText: Best app ever Open source, no ads, low memory usage, great games. What more could you want?

author: Jeremy Jordan
reviewText: So good! Addiction.

author: Dan iel
reviewText: Amazing Simon Love your work! From the amazing putty client, though to these time wasting but well implemented games.

author: Johnathan Ralls
reviewText: Excellent puzzle package It has all my favorite logic puzzles and some I never knew existed. Beyond a few control tweaks this game is polished.

author: Bill Furman
reviewText: My favorite tablet app I love this on my galaxy tab. I use it on my phone as well. No ads is awesome

author: Timothy Cooper
reviewText: Awesome! So many puzzle types, so much variation, all generated on demand so you never run out and it never repeats. Awesome!!

author: Myriah Dawn
reviewText: wow!!! awesome!!! thank you soo much!!!

reviewText: Give 5 stars without thinking! What will value more than almost 40 puzzle game in 1 and no ads!

author: james edwards
reviewText: Great games No ads!

author: James Arno
reviewText: Review updated June 2016: now 39 games AND pinch-to-zoom! This is the one game app I put on every single device I own. Awesome app. These puzzles are loads of fun - like the author put it, they work great as little "toys" to help pass the time. Having them on my phone is even better! Touch interface works really well, although larger puzzles are easier to control with a tablet even though there's pinch zoom. Definitely recommended.

author: Scott Lamb
reviewText: Hours of entertainment! A wide variety of puzzles and a very simple interface make for a great app to have anytime there is time to be killed.

author: Muthu Sankaralingam
reviewText: Nice collection of puzzles

author: _¥_¼_¡„â_µ„Û_ü___¡ _¢_¡_ü„ _¼_¡„
reviewText: A wonderful time killer with good controls and a wide variety of games. However, it would REALLY benefit from a "play random game" button.

author: Tormen Traubstein
reviewText: loved it and love it Thanks Chris! Great job :)

author: Rob O'Guinn
reviewText: Love this app Been using this app for over a year. Tons of great puzzels. I do wish it had more difficulty levels for some of the puzzles though

author: Cole McGinnis
reviewText: One of the most addictive apps ever I have spent so much time playing the absolute Miriad of puzzles included.

author: Samantha Davis
reviewText: Simply the best I have been enjoying this puzzle pack on my computer for many years now. It is simply the most well rounded puzzle pack in existence. The fact that it now fits in my purse is simply amazing.

author: James Preston
reviewText: Fantastic. :) Loved it. Great games. Playable offline. No ads. Millions of game possibilities.

author: Nick TwoThousand
reviewText: some of the puzzles are a little confusing

author: mou han mok
reviewText: Just the perfect game app to kill time

author: Sergio Daroca
reviewText: Best ever! Neat job! Gives hopes on human kind!

author: Matej PipÌ_Áka
reviewText: I don't normally do ratings... But when I do.. it's a game that I spent time playing and I still want more. Has no ads and is enjoyable and challenging. Doesn't make you feel like you have to play it all the time but it comes on your mind when you have some downtime - I could solve a puzzle or two! Definitely recommended. I'd say one of the few must have games for your android that you'll keep for a looong time because it just never gets old

author: TomoAlien
reviewText: Perfect No ads. No microtransactions. Just many puzzle games with fully adjustable difficulty in one nice package. If you like puzzle games, get this game now!

author: Tinko519
reviewText: Lots of choices. No ads!
